captions.text: Propose song

I waited for today 
for a long time

I hoped that you 
would become mine

Should I 
propose to you

Or have a party 
on your birthday

That day is today, 
My heart is beating

You are my lovely girl
You are my pretty girl

You are an angel for me forever 
Please take me

You are my lovely girl 
You are my pretty girl

Look at my eyes, 
can you answer me
I’m proposing to you

I thought about 
renting a pretty café

Or giving you a flower 
or ring at city hall

In front of a 
lot of people

You are my lovely girl 
You are my pretty girl

You are an angel for me forever 
Please take me

You are my lovely girl 
You are my pretty girl

Look at my eyes, 
can you answer me
I’m proposing to you

You might get tired from life 
You might get sick of me
But please hug me tight

I’m sorry and thankful 
For you to be here to

Hold my hand 
and cheer me up

You are my lovely girl
You are my pretty girl

You are an angel for me forever 
Please take me

You are my lovely girl 
You are my pretty girl

Look at my eyes, 
can you answer me
Can you take me

You are my lovely girl 
You are my pretty girl

You are an angel for me forever 
Please take me

You are my lovely girl 
You are my pretty girl

Look at my eyes, 
can you answer me
I’m proposing to you
I’m proposing to you
